Reviews.Title: “get what you pay for and less”

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel - best location.”

Reviews.Content: husband spent week hotel fourth floor front hotel following comments tiny double bed 2 single beds pushed wallpaper peeling walls air conditioning temperatures 35 degrees wasnt single glazed windows anyway due heat meant volume noisiest street rome im heard tanks night bathroom corner served sauna hopeless bathroom shower minute 6 feet tall extra lbs dont expect god forbid shave legs hairdryer tea facilities bottled water etc hotel smoking staff smoked reception walk past clouds smoke occasion renovations ongoing run meant climb painters stairs breakfast continental individually wrapped cheese slices la kraft cheese triangles juice hard buns croissants glazed sugar juice water hot drinks machine worst coffee ive positives location 5 minutes spanish steps trevi fountain close metro station trips 1 euro cost affordable dont book third party company straight hotel website bookingscom paid staff speak bit english easy book inout questions corkscrew gelati shop door sells beer wine late near lots cafesrestaurants 15 mins walk park lift previous user shut doors themselves bit shabby im talking centre half decent price afford dont

Reviews.Content: decided overnight trip rome home week trip sicily booked primarily due location mixed reviews tripadvisor bad besides staying 1 night bad hotel hostel am single woman york city takes lot feel unsafe minute stepped hotel bad feeling worse located dark corner literally lighting 3rd floor door cheap key lock aback tiny twin sized bed worn stained blanket worst smell smelled musty strong left smell remained clothing shower tiny black mildew lined corners dirty bath mat surprisingly towels actually clean white rash decision bolt left hotel head dinner visit sites location superb minutes spanish steps trevi fountain pantheon dinner couldnt feeling dread returning hotel 100 am returned hotel checked despite knowing sleeping hours checking morning couldnt stomach dreadful hotel using shower morning checking hotel concordia corner dont mind hostel quality boarding particularly excellent location otherwise save yourself time frustration book else plenty real hotels nearby quality reasonable nightly rates

Reviews.Content: yes traveller hates international style hotels personality traditions genuine pensione family run business changed thank god feels david film heavy curtains red vinyl chairs dim light simple style windows towards baroque church st andrea delle special bed comfortable linen day totally unnecessary breakfast typical continental style café tea bread jam egg toast dishes cheap besides probably coolest looking hotel rome remarkably nice location piazza di spagna fontana di trevi historical sites walking distance recommend hotel pensione boring standard hotels superficial genuine simple forget wifi zones free internet spa fitness whatever lay read book listen city bells st andrea delle
